dimensions.label: Confidence Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves in public?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently express their opinions and showcase their accomplishments.
Your FarTwin may come across as less confident, preferring to listen and observe before contributing.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on bold, high-risk endeavors to push boundaries and achieve greatness.
Your FarTwin may be hesitant to take risks, preferring a more methodical approach that prioritizes stability and security.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and loudly share their feelings, using emotional intensity to convey their message.
Your FarTwin may choose to keep their emotions private, only sharing them with those they trust most.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will make swift, often instinctual decisions that prioritize efficiency and speed.
Your FarTwin may take time to carefully weigh options, considering multiple perspectives before making a choice.

dimensions.label: Social Bonding Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will naturally gather and nurture friendships, creating strong social bonds with ease.
Your FarTwin may prioritize independence and self-reliance over forming close relationships, valuing personal space and freedom.

dimensions.label: Perfectionism
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for flawlessness, pouring effort and dedication into every task to achieve ultimate success.
Your FarTwin may prioritize efficiency and effectiveness over perfection, finding value in making progress rather than achieving an unattainable ideal.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will pursue artistic or innovative endeavors, seeking to bring new ideas and perspectives into the world.
Your FarTwin may focus on applying creativity in a more tangible way, such as through problem-solving or finding efficient solutions.

dimensions.label: Responsibility Attitude
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take ownership of their obligations, diligently following through on commitments and ensuring tasks are completed.
Your FarTwin may delegate or let others handle responsibilities, preferring to focus on high-priority initiatives rather than micromanaging.
